titles.title: To provide for the declassification of the journal kept by Glenn T. Seaborg while serving as Chairman of the Atomic Energy Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 11/4/1997--Introduced. Instructs the Secretary of Energy to return to Dr. Glenn T. Seaborg the journal he prepared while serving as Chairman of the Atomic Energy Commission, in the original, unredacted form in which it was submitted for review to the Commission's Division of Classification.
